languages.text: "Пока ты не мог работать, твоя жена была вынуждена пахать по три смены. И в итоге ослепла, когда сонная встала за станок, и проводящий заряд выжег ей глаза. Никто из нас не заслуживает подобного". {n}Жесткая и непреклонная. Каждое слово бьет по больному, но эту боль ей прощают за искренность. Ее слушают, чтобы собраться с силами. Чтобы разделить общую боль.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Чтобы прокормить семью, пока ты не мог работать, твоя жена была вынуждена пахать по три смены. И в итоге ослепла из-за того, что сонная встала за станок, и жар движущей силы выжег ей глаза. Это неправильно. Она не заслужила подобного. Никто из нас не заслуживает".
{n}Жесткая и непреклонная. Каждое твое слово бьет по больному, но эту боль тебе прощают за искренность. Тебя слушают, чтобы собраться с силами. Чтобы разделить общую боль.{/n}

languages.text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Пока ты не мог работать, твоя жена была вынуждена пахать по три смены. И в итоге ослепла, когда сонная встала за станок, и проводящий заряд выжег ей глаза. Никто из нас не заслуживает подобного". {n}Жесткая и непреклонная. Каждое слово бьет по больному, но эту боль ей прощают за искренность. Ее слушают, чтобы собраться с силами. Чтобы разделить общую боль.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

"While you could not work, your wife was forced to pull three shifts. Ended up blind when she fell asleep at the lathe and the Motive Force burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share the common pain.{/n}

None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

"Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

languages.text: "Da Ihr nicht arbeiten konntet, musste Eure Frau drei Schichten in Folge arbeiten. Sie ist an der Drehbank zusammengebrochen, und die leitende Entladung hat ihr die Augen ausgebrannt. Niemand von uns verdient das." {n}Hart und gnadenlos. Jedes Wort schmerzt, doch man verzeiht ihr ob ihrer Offenheit. Sie hören ihr zu, um sich zusammenzureißen. Um ihr gemeinsames Leid zu teilen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Da Ihr nicht arbeiten konntet, musste Eure Frau drei Schichten in Folge arbeiten. Sie ist an der Drehbank zusammengebrochen, und die Antriebskraft hat ihr die Augen ausgebrannt. Niemand von uns verdient das." {n}Hart und gnadenlos. Jedes Wort schmerzt, doch man verzeiht ihr ob ihrer Offenheit. Sie hören ihr zu, um sich zusammenzureißen. Um ihr gemeinsames Leid zu teilen.{/n}

languages.text: «Como no podías trabajar, tu mujer tuvo que hacer tres turnos. Se quedó inconsciente en el torno y la carga conductiva le quemó los ojos. Ninguno de nosotros se merece eso». {n}Dura y obstinada. Cada una de sus palabras duelen, pero su sinceridad le vale el perdón. Escuchan su historia para recuperar fuerzas. Para compartir su dolor colectivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como no podías trabajar, tu mujer tuvo que hacer tres turnos. Se quedó inconsciente en el torno y la Fuerza Motriz le quemó los ojos. Ninguno de nosotros se merece eso». {n}Dura y obstinada. Cada una de sus palabras duelen, pero su sinceridad le vale el perdón. Escuchan su historia para recuperar fuerzas. Para compartir su dolor colectivo.{/n}

languages.text: 「お前が働けなかったから、奥さんが3シフト働かなきゃならなかったんだ。彼女は旋盤の前で倒れて、電流で目を焼かれた。誰もそんな目に遭っていいはずがないんだ」{n}強靭かつ不屈。すべての言葉は痛いものだが、その誠実さゆえに彼女は許されている。彼らはその言葉に耳を傾ける。共通の痛みを分かち合うために。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前が働けなかったから、奥さんが3シフト働かなきゃならなかったんだ。彼女は旋盤の前で倒れて、動力で目を焼かれた。誰もそんな目に遭っていいはずがないんだ」{n}強靭かつ不屈。すべての言葉は痛いものだが、その誠実さゆえに彼女は許されている。彼らはその言葉に耳を傾ける。共通の痛みを分かち合うために。{/n}

languages.text: “那段时间你干不了活，你老婆不得不三班倒。结果干到最后，她倒在了车床上，眼睛都被电烧瞎了。我们根本不该遭这样的罪。”{n}这个坚韧不屈的女人说出的每个字都很伤人，但大家都原谅了她真诚的话语。人们听着她的话，分享着彼此的痛苦，打起了精神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，你干不了活，你老婆不得不三班倒。到最后，她倒在了车床前面，源力烧瞎了她的眼睛。我们根本不该遭这样的罪。”{n}这个坚韧不屈的女人说出的每个字都很伤人，但大家都原谅了她真诚的话语。人们听着她的话，分享着彼此的痛苦，打起了精神。{/n}

languages.text: « Puisque t'as pas pu travailler, ta femme a dû prendre trois quarts de suite. Elle était dans la tour quand elle s'est effondrée, et la charge conductrice lui a brûlé les yeux. Personne mérite ça. » {n}Dure et inflexible. Chaque mot qu'elle prononce blesse, mais sa sincérité lui vaut d'être pardonnée. Ses paroles les aident à se ressaisir. À partager leur douleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Puisque t'as pas pu travailler, ta femme a dû prendre trois quarts de suite. Elle était dans la tour quand elle s'est effondrée, et la Force Motrice lui a brûlé les yeux. Personne mérite ça. » {n}Dure et inflexible. Chaque mot qu'elle prononce blesse, mais sa sincérité lui vaut d'être pardonnée. Ses paroles les aident à se ressaisir. À partager leur douleur.{/n}

languages.text: "Sen çalışamadığın için karının üç vardiyada çalışması gerekiyor. Tornanın orada düşüp kaldı, sonra da iletken yükler gözlerini kavurdu. Hiçbirimiz bunu hak etmiyoruz." {n}Sert ve kararlı. Her bir sözü acı verse de dürüstlüğüyle kendini affettiriyor. Kendilerine çekidüzen vermek, ortak acılarını paylaşmak için onu dinliyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you couldn't work, your wife had to pull three shifts. She collapsed at the lathe, and the conductive charge burned out her eyes. None of us deserve that." {n}Tough and unyielding. Every word hurts, but she is forgiven for her sincerity. They listen to her to pull themselves together. To share their common pain.{/n}
